level.heading: Continued use of partnership name.
level.text: Continued use of a partnership name, or a dissociated partner's name as part thereof, by partners continuing the partnership's activities and affairs shall not of itself make the dissociated partner liable for a debt, obligation, or other liability of the partners or the partnership continuing the activities and affairs.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 substituted "partnership's activities and affairs" for the first occurrence of "business"; substituted "a debt, obligation, or other liability" for "an obligation"; and substituted "activities and affairs" for the second occurrence of "business."

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 705 of the Uniform Partnership Act (1997 Act).
Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
